venue.address_1: ONE Marina Park Drive at FAN PIER 55 Northern Ave
venue.name: Mass Challenge

item.description:
URGENT - Change of Venue to the Mass Challenge offices per this email:

"Quick Note
The  location has changed for Tuesday, August 16th's Pitch Fest 2011: Minute to Pitch It.  It will now be held at  MassChallenge Headquarters (55 Northern Ave, Boston).

Beers + Burritos: Our Sponsors
Be sure to spread the word to your friends, so no one misses out on free burritos and brews!  Free beer and burritos will be provided by: 


Date: Tuesday, August 16, 2011 from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM (ET)

Location:
MassChallenge Headquarters
ONE Marina Park Drive, 14th Floor
55 Northern Ave
Boston, MA 02210

For more information click here: Pitch Fest 2011: Minute to Pitch It"

 

Mass Challenge has a great event - the Pitch Fest - on our night and I think it would be better for us to go to this event and get to meet while we are there and then make some plans as best we can for the next meetup.

I reserved 6 tickets. If we go over I will plan to get additional seats.

The link to this event is:   http://minutetopitchit.eventbrite.com/

 

Coincidently I was pursuing getting space @ Microsoft's space anyway so let's go for this!

 

Lost or late, my cell is 781-801-4849.

 

Thanks

John
item.how_to_find_us: I have 6 seats reserved and will have a small sign and will claim a table early
item.name: Mass Challenge Pitch Fest 2011! (change of plan AND VENUE!)
